definition[0]: someone whose job is to control the preparation of a play, film, or broadcast, but who does not direct the actors
definition[1]: someone whose job is to organize and direct the recording and production of a record
definition[2]: a person, company, or country that makes or grows goods, foods, or materials
example[2]: South Carolina is the fourth largest producer of tobacco.
definition[3]: a person or organization that manages and finds the finance for films, plays etc
example[3]: Westwood One Inc., a Los Angeles-based producer and distributor of radio programs
definition[4]: a company or country that makes goods or grows foods
example[4]: Drummond Co. is the largest coal producer in Alabama.
example[5]: Hong Kong imports of textiles are hurting US producers.
